data.name: CosmicBreak Universal [Ivis Reine] Fan Pack
data.detailed_description:
CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Ivis Reine's fans!

A must-have for all Ivis Reine enthusiasts, this DLC included limited characters like Ivis-chan and Ivis, parts, titles, and other exclusive items! Don't pass this chance up!
The item pack also includes a Garapon ticket and other useful goodies!


Pack Contents (Robots)
  • Ivis Reine
  • Ivis-chan

Pack Contents (Parts)
  • Ivis Rucksack Booster x1
  • Ivis Print Fan x1
  • Title [Sylvia Fan ♪] x1

Pack Conents (Other)
  • 100 Rt
  • SP Garapon Ticket（x5）
    [*Cosmo Harmonics 20%（x30）
  • Tune-Up Set 10（x5）
  • ALL×3 Ticket 1h（x3）

※Purchase of this Pack is limited to one per account.
※[SP Garapon Tickets] allow players to roll the Garapon in the Shop.
※The Zero Saber visible in the screenshot is not included in this Pack.

data.short_description: CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Ivis Reine's fans!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce4 / ATI RADEON 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
